evs.name: Confirmation of studies from the admitted department
evs.description: Official confirmation from the department that the student is enrolled and studies are valid.

evs.name: Certification of no sport specialization
evs.description: Confirmation from the admitted department that it does not provide the specialization of the sport in which the student has achieved distinction.

evs.name: Confirmation from nearest educational institution
evs.description: Confirmation from the nearest relevant educational institution regarding the sport specialization in which the student has achieved distinction.

evs.name: Athletic federation certificate
evs.description: Confirmation from the relevant athletic federation that certifies the student's outstanding athletic distinction and active athlete status.

criterion_requirments.name: The department the student was admitted to must not provide the specialization of the sport in which the student has achieved distinction.
The department must be geographically distant from the location of the student's athletic training.
The athlete must have achieved outstanding distinction in Olympic Games, World, or European Championships.
The athlete-student must be active without interruption of athletic activity until the application submission date.
